summary: At sunrise five people meet on a high rise rooftop in order to leap to their deaths.
cast: Klaus Dieter Bange|Hildegard Schroedter|Katja Götz|Mathieu Süsstrunk|Arne Gottschling|Christian Heiner Wolf|Andrea Cleven|Uwe Rohbeck|Andreas Beck|Herwig Lucas|Jeannine Melanie Kollatz|Gunna Lena Hanuss|Erika Hesse|Werner Gerlach|Adi Siebert|Ibrahim Sall|Sonja Schulz|Anja Thimme|Ben Thimme|Noah Hunter|Renate Oswald
title: Suicide Club
